title: Medical Transport Technician
description_html: Responds to non-emergency, transport and mutual aid calls from sick and injured persons initiating contact through the County's 911 Emergency Call Center; completes a basic assessment of persons' condition, circumstances and needs; safely assists, lifts, carries, pushes, transfers and transports persons to various healthcare facilities in the metro Richmond area; provides compassionate and clinically competent basic life support care for stabilization and transport purposes; may refer the call to emergency responders and provide stabilization care until emergency responders arrive; does related work as required.

title: Chief Chaos Engineer 2.0
description_html: Are you ready to break the boundaries of conventional testing? As the Chief Chaos Engineer of Quantum Systems Testing, you’ll be responsible for orchestrating controlled digital mayhem to ensure our systems can withstand the most unpredictable scenarios imaginable. You’ll simulate black swan events, quantum entanglement bugs, and interdimensional latency spikes to push our infrastructure to the edge—and beyond.
description_text: Are you ready to break the boundaries of conventional testing? As the Chief Chaos Engineer of Quantum Systems Testing, you’ll be responsible for orchestrating controlled digital mayhem to ensure our systems can withstand the most unpredictable scenarios imaginable. You’ll simulate black swan events, quantum entanglement bugs, and interdimensional latency spikes to push our infrastructure to the edge—and beyond.

title: Treasury Services Officer II
description_html: Assigned to the Treasury Division of the Department of Finance; provides routine and moderately complex daily front line customer service and performs routine and moderately complex cashiering transactions; resolves routine and moderately complex inquiries regarding accounts for taxes, adjustments and various other payment types; accurately prepares and maintains a wide variety of detailed financial records, which may include budgets and other reports as assigned; assists with or is responsible for various day-to-day operational functions of the Treasury Division; and performs related work as assigned.

metadata.Location: Fire/Administration - 7721 East Parham Road, Henrico

title: Fire Air Utility Support Technician
description_html: This is an hourly-temporary classification only. An incumbent in this position staffs the mobile Air Utility Unit for a twenty-four-hour period consistent with the Division of Fire (DOF) shift-work schedule; responds to fire training events, calls for service and other events where a supplemental supply of breathing air and the other support functions of the Air Utility Unit are requested; ensures the appropriate Rehab Staging Area activated by the Incident Commander (IC), self-rehab (rest with hydration) or formal rehab with medical evaluations, is set-up and supported on scene to provide rest, rehydration, nutritional support, and relief from climatic conditions for responders who have been actively participating in incident operations to recover sufficiently to be deemed fit to return to duty at the incident; ensures accurate accountability of all first responders as they report to and are reassigned from the rehab staging area; performs other duties as assigned.
description_text: This is an hourly-temporary classification only. An incumbent in this position staffs the mobile Air Utility Unit for a twenty-four-hour period consistent with the Division of Fire (DOF) shift-work schedule; responds to fire training events, calls for service and other events where a supplemental supply of breathing air and the other support functions of the Air Utility Unit are requested; ensures the appropriate Rehab Staging Area activated by the Incident Commander (IC), self-rehab (rest with hydration) or formal rehab with medical evaluations, is set-up and supported on scene to provide rest, rehydration, nutritional support, and relief from climatic conditions for responders who have been actively participating in incident operations to recover sufficiently to be deemed fit to return to duty at the incident; ensures accurate accountability of all first responders as they report to and are reassigned from the rehab staging area; performs other duties as assigned.

title: Police Officer
description_html:
Performs law enforcement duties in an assigned area during a specific period; assists in investigations of criminal offenses and in the apprehension of criminals; does related work as required.


Information pertaining to testing will be sent by email to all applicants who meet minimum requirements. It is important that you keep your email address current in the Henrico Jobs website. If you have any questions or concerns, please call our recruiters at 804-501-5196.
